item.title: Bloodthirsty Vixen Amanda talks Death Match Tournament! - Jun 19,2011
item.description:
A special edition of Awesome Bomb Fight Radio is coming at you live on Saturday, June 18 to discuss the upcoming internet PPV DMT vs LCW Ignition! The beautiful and dangerous Bloodthirsty Vixen AMANDA will be leading some of the Legion Championship Wrestling contingent onto the show to tell us about the PPV and the sickening, violent matches that are schedules to take place at the Casa Del Mexicanos in East LA on Sunday, June 26 LIVE on http://www.gofightlive.com at 8 PM East. for more info check out http://www.thedeathmatch.tv/ or search Death Match Tournament on facebook find Amanda on facebook here http://www.facebook.com/MariahsRealm

item.title: BILL DUNDEE and AMANDA Live on Awesome Bomb Fight Radio! - Jan 27,2011
item.description:
The final week of Awesome Bomb Fight Radio before it becomes Ultraviolent Radio hosted by Mr California and we are going out with a bang! First, a true legend of the sport of Professional Wrestling, The Superstar, BILL DUNDEE! The Superstar is one of the biggest stars in the history of Southern Wrestling.. especially Memphis winning every title in the area there was to win.. Also winning the AWA World Tag Team Titles with his arch rival Jerry The King Lawler. Dundee and Lawler have been fueding for over 30 years and will be fighting again on Feb 2nd in Evansville, IN at CCW's Legends Showdown. http://www.facebook.com/pages/Coliseum-Championship-Wrestling/79115136892?v=info" CCW's Facebook Profile http://www.superstardundee.com" Superstar Bill Dundee's Official Website Then, Our favorite guest... the hottest and most controversial female wrestler in Southern California The Bloodthirsty Vixen AMANDA!.... She has been very busy since her last appearance being interviewed for magazines, appearing on Judge shows, traveling to the East Coast to wrestle and all kinds of other great stuff http://www.facebook.com/mariahsrealm Amanda on Facebook http://www.myspace.com/mariahsrealm Amanda on MySpace http://www.twitter.com/bloodyvixen Amanda on Twitter So join your heroic hosts Gaius Julius Sensei and Violence Jack with Amos Da Strangla, Mr Californai, K Ross Kovington plus booze, pot and controversy!

item.title: Awesome Bomb Fight Radio! - May 20,2010
item.description:
Joining us first will be the Greatest Intercontinental Champion of all time!! The Honky Tonk Man! The longest reigning IC champ in history is coming on to give us the low down on the new Legends of Wrestling Music Tour he is embarking on with Jimmy Hart, Koko B Ware, and Hillbilly Jim. We also want to talk with him about what Jake The Snake said about him on the show a couple weeks ago, TNA, Eric Bischoff and all the other controversy HTM keeps himself surrounded with! Then! Fresh out of prison after a railroading on obscenity charges we are going to have one of the most controversial figures in the history of wrestling... the owner of Extreme Associates adult entertainment company.. the former owner of XPW Wrestling ROB BLACK! The former owner of XPW now hates pro wrestling and pro wrestlers and is coming on to lay it all out for us. Black is never short on words or opinions and this interview looks to be absolutely explosive to the max! Honky Tonk Man's Official Website www.honkytonkman.net

item.title: Mike Levy live on Awesome Bomb Fight Radio! - May 13,2010
item.description:
The object of one of the worst shoot beatings in the history of wrestling and still alive and kickin to tell about it The White Lion, The Misfit... He is Mike Levy. Calling from out in Milestone Wrestling country in North Carolina we are gonna get his reaction from some previous interviews we have done with others involved about what happened that day and hear about how his wrestling career and notoriety have progressed since. Violence Jack and Sensei will also have stories of rockin with the true wrestling superstars over the last weekend as the Legends of Wrestling Fanfest hit St Louis and your heroes hit the casino and hotel with a few names to be mentioned later that still know how to party and keep it real. plus Mr California, 60 Seconds with K Ross Kovington and any other controversy we can uncover THE MIKE LEVEY INCIDENT! Soupbone666 put CZW in the titles but it was actually IWA-MS so we already know. No comments from nerds please. Drink a beer and lighten up. This IS NOT for the timid. item.title: Joel Gertner, Steve Corino and CW Anderson on Awesome Bomb Fight Radio! - Mar 18,2010
item.description:
Awesome Bomb Fight Radio Goes Extreme! ...Being joined first by the ECW Star... in his own words "Despite what the Florida tourism board has been feeding all of you ignorant people, it is I every females top tourist destination and the man whos crotch is truly the happiest place on earth, the man who makes Minnie Mouses panties wet and the man who just last night helped Daisy Duck fulfill her dreams as she took one for the team and I made her squeal and scream as I filled her full of cream, it is I, the bacon in her eggs, the man for whom she begs and the face between her legs.... The Quintessential and original studmuffin and a Good Lord, have mercy God damn handsome man... JOEL 'I shoot out a full condom filla and it tastes like vanilla' GERTNER" He is now promoting MXW Pro Wrestling and their upcoming show "Come What May". It will be headlined by a one night, sixteen man, random draw single-elimination tournament. It is scheduled for May 16, 2010 at Toad's Place in New Haven, Connecticut. THEN Mr Wrestling III Steve Corino and The Enforcer CW Anderson... THE EXTREME HORSEMEN! The King of Old School is a former ECW, NWA and AWA World Champion and the championship partner of CW Anderson of Original and the WWE version of ECW!... find out about working the indies, working for Japan, how to become a wrestler.... plus the usual drunken commentary you have come to expect from Awesome Bomb Fight Radio!

item.title: Tool Academy's Chasyn Rance and Mickie Knuckles on Awesome Bomb Fight Radio! - Mar 11,2010
item.description:
This show had to be rescheduled to do rockin but it is finally here! You've seen him in Ring Of Honor, TNA and MLW... The NWA, AWA, Jersey All Pro Wrestling, FIP... All Star Wrestling in the UK... Stampede Wrestling in Canada and a hundred other wrestling federations throughout the world... but "Not Cocky" Chasyn Rance may best know for telling VH1's Tool Academy To Suck It last week on the season premier. If you want to know anything about Tool Academy, wrestling on the indies, developing a character that can make tools hate you in less than a day, bangin ring rats or anything else this is the show for you! THEN THE most hardcore female wrestler in the world, The Queen Of The Deathmatch MICKIE KNUCKLES! She was known as Moose in TNA and made her name in IWA-MS in deathmatches as well as working in such awesome feds as Chikara, IWA East Coast, Chickfight, wXw Germany, Full Throttle Wrestling, Pro Wrestling Unplugged and CZW. We will find out what happened to her run in TNA, The horrible broken leg that forced her out of wrestling for a while, The status of IWA-MS, and whatever you guys bring up with Mickie!

item.title: Living Legend Larry Zbyszko and the New FN Show Jerry Lynn - Mar 04,2010
item.description:
AWESOME BOMB NIGHT OF CHAMPIONS!! He is the former AWA World Champion and the arch enemy of Bruno Sammartino in the WWWF. He was WCW World TV Title and Tag Team Champion, commentator for WCW Monday Nitro.. He is The one and only Living Legend Larry Zbyszko! Here with us on Awesome Bomb Fight radio to discuss his epic career, what he is up to now including his pro golfing situation! THEN... the former ECW and ROH Champion of the world and TNA X- Division Champion the NEW FN SHOW Jerry Lynn! Find out about ROH on HDNET, ECW on TNN, TNA on Spike TV and what it has been like to be an integral part of 3 great alternatives to WWE. We will also get into death metal and all the normal off beat subjects we always get into on Aweswome Bomb Fight Radio!
